name: macrosandmeals
author: Surani Harsh
description: A backend API that powers an all-in-one online platform, helping users create personalized diet plans in just three easy steps. Whether aiming to lose weight, gain muscle, or eat healthier, this science-based API simplifies meal planning and makes the process straightforward and stress-free. This is a backend-focused project designed to handle user data, diet recommendations, and integration with front-end platforms.
